Description: Home eBay Store Design by Visualsoft Home About Us Our Feedback Contact Us Shop Categories Shop Home Electronics Watches Diamond Rings Bangles Bracelets Coins, Ingots & Bars Earrings Necklaces Rings Womens Watches SALE Other Unisex Tag Heuer Pre Owned Watch Tag Heuer Link Ref WT1211 £345.00 Ask a Question Description Contact Us Delivery & Returns Payment Why Buy From Us Established in 1987, Ramsdens has over 120 branches throughout Northern England, Scotland and Wales and are one of the U.K’s top recognised and trusted high street retailers. We are a trusted eBay seller and business. Welcome to our Pre Owned Jewellery and Watches e b a y shop We offer all pre owned jewellery and watches at exceptional value for money! If you are not entirely delighted with your purchase, we will offer you a full refund on receipt of the returned item. All items are honestly described to the best of our ability. All items are professionally cleaned to a high standard and will be boxed to arrive at your destination in excellent condition. Also including FREE UK delivery and a FREE Jewellery Box! So grab yourself a bargain TODAY! Description Unisex Tag Heuer Link Ref WT1211 Unisex Tag Heuer Link Ref WT1211. 34mm stainless steel case with blue quarter Arabic dial. Presented on a stainless steel bracelet and powered by a quartz movement. Comes with gift box only. Pre-Owned item in excellent condition - Like new Description 1 Unisex Tag Heuer Link Ref WT1211 Description 2 Stainless steel case and bracelet Description 3 Quartz Movement Size 34mm case and 17.5cm bracelet strap Box and papers Gift box only Price £345.00 Reference Number # 963163165001 We describe our items honestly and to the best of our ability, any defects will always be outlined in the items description above. Payment We accept PayPal as the mode of payment. If you wish to purchase an item and have zero feedback please contact us before placing the order, we do not accept purchases from zero feedback eBay users unless previously approved. Warranty and Returns Policy We offer a 3 month warranty on all jewellery purchases and a 12 month warranty on watches. Proof of purchase is required and items must be returned in original condition with the original box supplied. If a resident from outside the UK (Mainland) wishes to return their item, they must be aware that if a customs charge occurs during the item’s passage to be returned they are liable to have the charge deducted from their refund amount. For further information, don’t hesitate to message us to find out more. Delivery Domestic Shipping If you live within the UK, your item will be carefully packed and dispatched within 2-3 working days (Mon-Fri) of receiving payment. Postage is FREE for all UK domestic residence. All items under £100 are posted via Royal Mail 1st Class Recorded whilst items over £100 are posted Royal Mail Special Delivery before 1pm unless stated. Items can be arranged for collection from our Coulby Newham store located at Unit 16, The Parkway Centre, Middlesbrough, TS8 0TJ or our Acklam store located at 105 Acklam Road, Middlesbrough, TS5 5HR. (Please contact us if you wish to arrange a collection). International Shipping If you do not live in the UK, you can purchase specific items which are eligible with eBay's Global Shipping Programme. These items require a postage charge which will be automatically calculated depending on your location and displayed in the listing. A list of participating countries in the Global Shipping Programme can be found on eBay itself, to see if we are able to ship to you. All international orders must be purchased with Paypal and all international orders are thoroughly checked before being approved. Contact us Our normal business hours are: Monday to Friday 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. All messages and orders will be processed during working hours. Please note that messages, orders or all other enquiries will not be processed at weekends or during Bank Holidays. All messages and enquiries must be contacted through e b a y messaging and they will be responded within 24 hours during business hours. Ramsdens is a trading name of Ramsdens Financial Limited. Registered Office: Unit 16, The Parkway Centre, Coulby Newham, Middlesbrough, TS8 0TJ. Registered in England Number 3045495. VAT Registration Number 654 2564 31. Money Service Business Registration Number: 12115794. We are a trusted eBay seller and business, if you require any additional information about our items please do not hesitate to contact us. We will answer all questions within 24 hours Monday to Friday.E-mail: it-ebay@ramsdensfinancial.co.uk The costs of delivery will be as displayed to you on our website.We will deliver products (such as jewellery and watches) to you as soon as reasonably possible [and in any event within 7 days after the day on which we accept your order]. Typically, we will send goods to you using the second class "Signed For" service. You can also choose to collect products from any of our branches in the UK.We will not be liable for delays in delivering your goods where such delay is due to reasons outside of our control, if for whatever reason your delivery will be delayed we will contact you.Please note: delivery lead times are extended over public holidays. if your order contains multiple items they may be dispatched direct from different suppliers, locations and/or at different times. If you are picking up your order from a local store, you will need to go in person, and take with you the payment card you used to pay online as well as your receipt. These requirements are for your peace of mind, as they allow us to ensure your details are completely secure.If you fail to collect your order from your selected Ramsdens location within 30 days of the collection date then your Order will be marked as ?not-collected? and may be cancelled at the sole discretion of Ramsdens.If you have asked to collect the products from our premises, you can collect them from us at any time during our working hours on weekdays (excluding public holidays) and Saturdays. Please be aware that opening hours vary across our branches, so please check online at www.RamsdensForCash.co.uk.If our supply of the products is delayed by an event outside our control then we will contact you as soon as possible to let you know and we will take steps to minimise the effect of the delay. Provided we do this we will not be liable for delays caused by the event, but if there is a risk of substantial delay you may contact us to end the contract and receive a refund for any products you have paid for but not received.If you do not collect the products from us as arranged or if, after a failed delivery to you, you do not re-arrange delivery or collect them from a delivery depot we will contact you for further instructions and may charge you for storage costs and any further delivery costs. If, despite our reasonable efforts, we are unable to contact you or re-arrange delivery or collection we may end the contract.  The pounds sterling amount less a ?10 cancellation charge will be refunded by Ramsdens on the cancellation day if it is a Working Day or the next available Working Day. The date the monies reach your bank account is dependent upon your bank processing the refund which could take from 2 to 10 Working Days.The product will be your responsibility from the time we deliver the product to the address you gave us or you collect it from us.You own a product which is goods once we have received payment in full. We only accept PayPal as method of payment.
